text: 11:10 Hibru 3:4; 13:14; Akar Mogomem 21:2; 21:10Abraham zurara nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikia nguibar ekiar gavgavigha itir kamɨn ganasa mɨzua iti. Nguibar ekiar kam, God uabɨra tuavir an ingaramibagh nɨghnigha, egha uabɨ an ingari.11:10 Nguibar ekiar kam Jerusalem, a Godɨn Nguibamɨn iti. Nɨ Hibru 12:2ɨn gan egh fogh.
